text:
@Jim_Jordan Russia interfered with US elections.  That is not disputed.

trump was impeached.
That is not disputed. 

The senate failed to call witnesses.
That is not disputed.

#COVID19 response was terrible.
That is not disputed.

The US would be opened up by now and thousands saved!
